newsitem.title: UK: Eidos plummets on share deals inquiry report.
newsitem.headline: Eidos plummets on share deals inquiry report.

text.p: Shares in Eidos Plc fell 62-1/2p to 487-1/2p on Friday after a report in the Guardian newspaper said financial industry regulators were investigating share dealings in the company's stock, market-makers said.
"Everyone wants to steer clear of them for the moment," said one market-maker.
"The story in the paper is enough to take them down this far but the results were bang in line," he said, referring to first quarter results released early on Friday.
The company said it made a loss before tax of 4.9 million stg in the three months to the end of June this year.
No one at Eidos was immediately available to comment on the Guardian report.
